nodes.text: Tangan Ind was a corporation active at the time of the Invasion of Scipio. It was one of several company names scrolling across the screens in Rush Clovis' office atop the Main Vault fortress on Scipio.

Tangan Ind was first mentioned under the name Tangan Industries in the 2010 Star Wars Legends roleplaying supplement The Unknown Regions. It was established to be canon by "Crisis at the Heart," the seventh episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season.
